last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
sub_title: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven
summary:
CHEOPS, Study association of the Built Environment, is the mother association of the faculty of the Built Environment. CHEOPS represents all Built Environment students of the TU/e. CHEOPS aims to represent the interests of the students of the faculty Built Environment of the TU/e
As Built Environment student you will have to subscribe to CHEOPS. With this free subscription you will gain access to a wide range of activities organized by committees. Next to this, you can make use of several services provided by CHEOPS, like book sales with reduced prices, cheap magazine subscriptions and practice exams to test your knowledge on. In addition, does CHEOPS publishes its own Built Environment magazine Chepos.

treasury_media.title: CHEOPS Brochure.pdf
treasury_media.description:
In deze brochure kunt u alle essentiële informatie vinden over CHEOPS, en mogelijke manieren om samen te werken en uw netwerk onder studenten te vergroten. 

In this brochure, you can find all essential information about CHEOPS, as well as possible ways to collaborate and grow your network amongst students.

projects.title: Plugged Festival
projects.description: Every year the Plugged Festival Committee organizes the largest music festival by and for students on the TU/e campus. With over 2500 visitors a year, two stages and local breakthrough talent the festival has quickly become a steady factor in the Eindhoven studentlife.

contributors.last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
contributors.headline: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven

projects.title: 24 Hours Project
projects.description: The Contest Committee organizes a 24-hoursproject, a multidisciplinary design contest! The committee will choose a project and location which will be secret until the time of arrival. In collaboration with the involved parties the assignment and the professional jury will be made up.

contributors.last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
contributors.headline: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven

projects.title: Chepos Magazine
projects.description: The Magazine Committee publishes the Chepos three times a year with a print of over a 1000 as well as digitally. This Built Environment magazine comprises news articles, columns by professionals and fascinating stories about all aspects of our field of work.

contributors.last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
contributors.headline: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven

projects.title: Excursions and lectures
projects.description: CHEOPS organizes different kinds of professional activities for all the students at the Built Environment department. For example a one day excursion to a construction site, a lunch lecture or a tour of an architect.

contributors.last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
contributors.headline: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven

projects.title: Large Trip
projects.description: Biannually, the Large Trip Committee organizes a trip of two weeks to a country outside of Europe. Students get the chance to experience multiple cities and the countryside through study-related visitations of projects and buildings, as well as cultural hotspots. The committee aims to let the excursion focus on all aspects of the Built Environment; architecture, construction, building physics, urban planning and real estate.

contributors.last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
contributors.headline: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven

projects.title: Small Trip
projects.description: The Small Trip Committee organizes an excursion of multiple days to a city in Europe. Students get the chance to experience the city through study-related visitations of projects and buildings. The committee aims to let the excursion focus on all aspects of the Built Environment; architecture, construction, building physics, urban planning and real estate.

contributors.last_name: Study association of the Built Environment
contributors.headline: The study association for all students of the Built Environment in Eindhoven

projects.title: GLOW
projects.description: As a joint venture with Lucid CHEOPS designed and built a light installation for the annual GLOW Festival in Eindhoven in 2016, 2018 and 2019. The projects comprised radically new ideas for interaction with the public, challenging construction feats of engineering and partnerships with the Eindhoven University of Technology, Innovation Space and several companies. A three-time success, more may be expected from the future.

company.name: Study Association Architecture, Building and Planning

profile_positions.company: CHEOPS, Study association of the Built Environment
profile_positions.description: CHEOPS, Study Association of the Built Environment is the main study association of the faculty of the Built Environment. CHEOPS represents all the students of our faculty and protects the general interests of these students. CHEOPS is located in the bridge connecting Vertigo and the Zwarte Doos.
